<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106025</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204449</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pollution plume</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verunreinigung Feder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plume de pollution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plume da poluição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plume di inquinamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λοφίο ρύπανσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plume de la contaminación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The students will simulate a plume to illustrate point source and non-point source pollution.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kursteilnehmer simulieren eine Feder, um 
Punktquell- und Nichtpunkt Quellverunreinigung zu veranschaulichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants simuleront une plume pour illustrer
la pollution de source de point et de source de non-point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes simularão um plume para ilustrar a 
poluição da fonte do ponto e da fonte do non-ponto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi simuleranno un plume per illustrare 
l'inquinamento di sorgente del punto e di sorgente del non-punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μιμηθούν ένα λοφίο για τη ρύπανση να
επεξηγήσουν σημείου της πηγής και πηγής μη-σημείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes simularán un plume para ilustrar 
la contaminación de la fuente de la punta y de la fuente de la 
no-punta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

    </metadata>
  </description>
